content.rendered:
This report documents 12 months of steady innovation and achievement for the Foundation. It features many highlights, including the 2022 Commonwealth People’s Forum in Kigali, our work on climate justice at COP27 and activities celebrating the tenth anniversary of the Commonwealth Charter.

FundFinity Grants Annual Report 2022-23
